segments.text: I glance into this kitchen and see a peaceful scene at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's focused on her dish drying, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the sink is overflowing wildly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring out, forming a big puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in it, no clue at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there are the children, up to mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s climbing the stool to the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s tipping; my heart skips thinking he might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s holding a plate too, trying to be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s reaching for her cookie, looking hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re so innocent in their little scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the slippery floor adds real danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tidy garden view makes the chaos inside stand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the mom would turn around and notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a happy memory or a bad one.
segments.speaker: PAR
